story:
You drive through a little town of 500 people and then a tiny village of 137 people.
Finally you come to a giant split. The highway branches into 16 different roads.
Do you go straight on Vizinni road, turn onto Cheesecakeville road, go to Lafalot road,
go to the University of Thrill road, go to the University of Chemistry road,
go to Candylandville road, go to Ground 51 do not enter road, go on Stained Glass road,
turn on noodles road, go to normal town road, go to weird town road, go to hippie paradise road,
go to the lumber business road, go on Country fried Squirrels road,
go on mouseland road, or go to Bookworm road?
